ValidationRule.description: Once a property has been added, name changes are limited to particular profiles
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name != "NI PSA Administrator", $Profile.Name != "System Administrator", $Profile.Name != "NI IMT Global Super User", $Profile.Name != "NI IMT Regional Admin", NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Name))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please contact a regional or global admin to have the property name modified.
